biotools.summary: FLAVi (Fast Loci Annotation of Viruses) is a pipeline that aims to provide an annotation framework for multiple complete or partial genomes of viruses. Currently, FLAVi is designed to annotate the genomes of viruses of the family Flaviviridae only.

bioschemas.name: FLAVi
bioschemas.summary: FLAVi (Fast Loci Annotation of Viruses) is a pipeline that aims to provide an annotation framework for multiple complete or partial genomes of viruses. Currently, FLAVi is designed to annotate the genomes of viruses of the family Flaviviridae only.
